init_eqs_str: a['sounds'] = 0; a['att'] = 0; a['dy_residual'] = 0; a['dx_residual'] = 0; a['bass_tresh'] = 0; a['q1'] = 0;
frame_eqs_str: a['sounds']=div(((a['bass']+a['treb'])+a['mid']),3); a['mv_dx']=(a['mv_dx']*a['sounds']); a['mv_dy']=(a['mv_dy']*a['sounds']); a['mv_a']=(a['mv_a']*a['sounds']); a['dy']=(a['dy']+a['dy_residual']); a['dx']=(a['dx']+a['dx_residual']); a['bass_tresh']=((above(a['bass_att'], a['bass_tresh'])*2)+((1-above(a['bass_att'], a['bass_tresh']))*(((a['bass_tresh']-1.3)*0.96)+1.3))); a['dx_residual']=(((equal(a['bass_tresh'], 2)*0.016)*Math.sin((a['time']*Math.floor(rand(10)))))+((1-equal(a['bass_tresh'], 2))*a['dx_residual'])); a['dy_residual']=(((equal(a['bass_tresh'], 2)*0.036)*Math.sin((a['time']*Math.floor(rand(10)))))+((1-equal(a['bass_tresh'], 2))*a['dy_residual'])); a['q1']=a['bass_tresh']; a['monitor']=Math.abs((a['q1']*10));
